-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public.cities
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    city_name character varying,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.cover_letters
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    body character varying(255),
    header character varying(255),
    jobseeker_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.educations
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    department character varying(255),
    faculty character varying(255),
    graduation_date timestamp without time zone,
    school_name character varying(255),
    starting_date timestamp without time zone,
    jobseeker_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employers
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    company_name character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    website character varying(70),
    phone character varying(15) NOT NULL,
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.experiences
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    end_date timestamp without time zone,
    starting_date timestamp without time zone,
    workplace character varying(255),
    job_id integer,
    jobseeker_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.images
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    image_url character varying(255),
    user_id integer,
    uploaded_date timestamp without time zone,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_advertisements
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    description character varying(30),
    min_salary integer,
    max_salary integer,
    number_of_position integer,
    due_date date,
    is_active boolean,
    job_id integer,
    city_id integer,
    employer_id integer,
    release_date timestamp without time zone,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_seekers
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    first_name character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    national_identity character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    birth_date date,
    user_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.jobs
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.jobseeker_language
(
    jobseeker_id integer NOT NULL,
    language_id integer NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE public.languages
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    level integer,
    name character varying(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resumes
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    user_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.skills
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255),
    jobseeker_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.social_media_accounts
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    link character varying(255),
    name character varying(255),
    jobseeker_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.system_staffs
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    first_name character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.users
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    email character varying NOT NULL,
    password character varying NOT NULL,
    pasword character varying(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verifications
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    mernis_verification boolean,
    email_verification boolean,
    system_verification boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE public.cover_letters
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (jobseeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.educations
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (jobseeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.experiences
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (jobseeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.experiences
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_id)
    REFERENCES public.jobs (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.images
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisements
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_id)
    REFERENCES public.jobs (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisements
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (city_id)
    REFERENCES public.cities (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_advertisements
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.job_seekers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.jobseeker_language
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (language_id)
    REFERENCES public.languages (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.jobseeker_language
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (jobseeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.resumes
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.skills
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (jobseeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.social_media_accounts
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (jobseeker_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_seekers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.system_staffs
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verifications
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;

END;
